zip: A comprehensive collection of ZIP archive manipulation task blocks for the OOMOL workflow platform. This package provides 15 specialized task blocks covering all aspects of ZIP file operations, from basic compression and extraction to advanced features like encryption, encoding conversion, and archive management.
add-new-files-or-folders-to-an-existing-: Add new files or folders to an existing ZIP archive
files-or-folders-to-add-to-zip: Files or folders to add to ZIP
optional-prefix-for-files-in-archive: Optional prefix for files in archive
overwrite-files-if-they-already-exist-in: Overwrite files if they already exist in ZIP
compress-multiple-folders-into-separate-: Compress multiple folders into separate ZIP archives in a batch operation
list-of-folders-to-compress-individually: List of folders to compress individually
optional-password-for-all-zip-files: Optional password for all ZIP files
create-zip-archive-with-customizable-com: Create ZIP archive with customizable compression level and method
file-or-folder-path-to-compress: File or folder path to compress
fix-filename-encoding-issues-in-zip-arch: Fix filename encoding issues in ZIP archives, especially for Chinese/Asian filenames
path-to-zip-file-with-encoding-issues: Path to ZIP file with encoding issues
output-zip-file-path-with-corrected-enco: Output ZIP file path with corrected encoding
source-encoding-of-filenames-in-zip: Source encoding of filenames in ZIP
attempt-to-fix-garbled-chinese-filenames: Attempt to fix garbled Chinese filenames
compress-files-or-folders-into-a-zip-arc: Compress files or folders into a ZIP archive with basic compression
file-or-folder-path-to-compress2: File or folder path to compress
compress-files-or-folders-into-a-passwor: Compress files or folders into a password-protected AES encrypted ZIP archive
file-or-folder-path-to-compress3: File or folder path to compress
extract-all-contents-from-a-zip-archive-: Extract all contents from a ZIP archive to a specified directory
path-to-zip-file-to-extract: Path to ZIP file to extract
extract-contents-from-a-password-protect: Extract contents from a password-protected encrypted ZIP archive
path-to-encrypted-zip-file-to-extract: Path to encrypted ZIP file to extract
extract-zip-contents-to-a-flat-directory: Extract ZIP contents to a flat directory structure, ignoring subdirectories
path-to-zip-file-to-extract2: Path to ZIP file to extract
maximum-number-of-files-to-extract-0-unl: Maximum number of files to extract (0=unlimited)
extract-only-specific-files-from-a-zip-a: Extract only specific files from a ZIP archive
path-to-zip-file-to-extract3: Path to ZIP file to extract
list-of-specific-files-to-extract-relati: List of specific files to extract (relative paths)
analyze-zip-file-and-extract-detailed-me: Analyze ZIP file and extract detailed metadata and statistics
path-to-zip-file-to-analyze: Path to ZIP file to analyze
list-and-analyze-contents-of-a-zip-archi: List and analyze contents of a ZIP archive with detailed information
path-to-zip-file-to-list-contents: Path to ZIP file to list contents
merge-multiple-zip-archives-into-a-singl: Merge multiple ZIP archives into a single ZIP file with duplicate handling
list-of-zip-files-to-merge: List of ZIP files to merge
passwords-for-encrypted-zip-files-in-ord: Passwords for encrypted ZIP files (in order, optional)
split-a-large-zip-archive-into-smaller-f: Split a large ZIP archive into smaller files based on maximum size limit
path-to-zip-file-to-split: Path to ZIP file to split
maximum-size-per-split-file-in-mb: Maximum size per split file in MB
directory-to-save-split-zip-files: Directory to save split ZIP files
validate-zip-file-integrity-test-extract: Validate ZIP file integrity, test extraction, and verify checksums
path-to-zip-file-to-validate: Path to ZIP file to validate
verify-crc-checksums-of-all-files: Verify CRC checksums of all files
